summary: Comprehensive frontend testing completed for Gace Builds static HTML/CSS/jQuery website. All core functionality working correctly including navigation, filtering, form validation, mobile responsiveness, and user interactions.
passed_tests: Homepage loads with hero section, services overview, testimonials, and CTAs
Services page loads with working filter buttons (All Services, Websites, Marketing, Support)
About page loads with functional FAQ accordion (6 FAQ items tested)
Blog page loads with category filtering and pagination working correctly
Contact form validation working for required fields (name, email, service, message, privacy)
Contact form shows success message after valid submission (frontend-only as designed)
Mobile navigation toggle functionality works correctly
All navigation links work (Home, Services, About, Blog, Contact)
Legal footer links work (Privacy, Terms, Disclaimer pages load)
Mobile responsiveness - layout adapts properly to 390x844 viewport
Newsletter subscription form present and functional
Social media links present (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn)
Service filter buttons work (websites, marketing, support categories)
Blog filter buttons work (all posts, getting-started, marketing, SEO, tips)
Contact form hides after successful submission
Form field interactions work on mobile devices
